content:
IServiceRemotingContract Interface

Definition

Interface that defines the contract for WCF service remoting.

In this Article

[System.ServiceModel.ServiceContract(CallbackContract=typeof(Microsoft.ServiceFabric.Services.Remoting.Wcf.IServiceRemotingCallbackContract), Namespace="urn:ServiceFabric.Communication")]
public interface IServiceRemotingContract
Attributes
System.ServiceModel.ServiceContract

Methods

OneWayMessage(ServiceRemotingMessageHeaders, Byte[])

Sends a one way message to the client.
RequestResponseAsync(ServiceRemotingMessageHeaders, Byte[])

Sends a message to the client and gets the response.
